channel.title: Editing starting gear etc?
channel.description: I want to edit the starting gear, which file is it in? What do I search inside the file?

item.title: Editing starting gear etc?
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Here is a Tut for you.

go to player.java

search

playerEquipment[playerHat]=

there u have it

example :

  [code]playerEquipment[playerHat]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerCape]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerChest]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerShield]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerLegs]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerHands]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerFeet]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerRing]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerArrows]=      -1;
  playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=      -1;[/code]

-1 is nothing

like… if i want to start with a blue phat… do

  playerEquipment[playerHat]=      1042;

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
